title: 关于bungeecord问题
author: geyumei
txt_content:
本帖最后由 geyumei 于 2014-10-10 19:14 编辑 

为什么我配置好bungeecord的con,然后进服输入/server提示什么的/help。难道我哪里配置，设置错了？？
配置文件
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
player_limit: -1
stats: c8ae7678-add9-45f9-8380-4a370941f87c
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
listeners:
- max_players: 1
  fallback_server: lobby
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: false
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  default_server: lobby
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  query_enabled: false
  query_port: 25577
timeout: 30000
connection_throttle: -1
servers:
  lobby:
    address: localhost:25555
    restricted: false
    motd: '&1第三旋登录服'
ip_forward: false
online_mode: false

replies.author: 尘曲
replies.txt_content: 你是从25565这个端口进去的么= =
